member.name: IAppxBundleManifestReader2.GetOptionalBundles
member.summary: Retrieves an object that represents the <OptionalBundles> element under the root <Bundle> element.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestReader2
member.summary: Provides a read-only object model for manifests of bundle packages.
